title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2650.6 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2650.6 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) No charge will
be made to inspect a record, certify a record or to certify a denial of a
request for a record and the reason therefor. (b) A charge will be made of 25 cents per
page for photocopying of pages that are not larger than 9 inches by 14 inches. There will no charge for the first five pages. (c) Charges for materials or services other
than paper shall be based on the actual cost to the division. (d) Payments for copy charges or charges for
other materials or services shall be made by check or money order payable to
"New York State Division of Housing and Community Renewal."
(e) The requestor shall be notified of the
amount of the fee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2650.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
